traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the ice piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ice piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Drop
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, one creature directly underneath the ice piercer. 3 (1d6 damage) piercing damage per 10 feet fallen, up to 21 ({@dice 6d6}). Miss: The ice piercer takes half the normal falling damage for the distance fallen.
